question: What is the official administrative role of the city of Hail in Saudi Arabia?
true_answer: Hail is the administrative and regional capital of the Hail region in Saudi Arabia.
asked_question_translated: Quel est le rôle administratif officiel de la ville de Hail en Arabie saoudite ?
answer: La ville de Hail en Arabie saoudite est le chef-lieu de la région de Hail.
answer_translated_eng: The town of Hail in Saudi Arabia is the capital of the Hail region.
